com.netflix.nfgraph.compressed

Class NFCompressedGraphPointers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.nfgraph.compressed.NFCompressedGraphPointers

  • public class NFCompressedGraphPointers
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all of the offsets into the NFCompressedGraph's byte array.

    This class maintains a mapping of type name to int array. For a given type, the offset in the NFCompressedGraph's byte array where the connections for a given node are encoded is equal to the value of the int array for the node's type at the index for the node's ordinal.

    It is unlikely that this class will need to be used externally.
